About Me

I am a third-year Computer Science & Engineering student currently studying at Maharaja Agrasen Institute of Technology, New Delhi, IN. I am a person who finds logic behind everything and my whimsical jokes keep the environment lively! I have been dismantling stuff (that included everything from a pencil cell torch to unused appliances that often landed me up in trouble :P) since I was a kid which brought me to pursue a higher education in a technological field. I have been programming for a couple years now but have also dipped my toes in various other technologies - Web Development, Android App Development and Human Computer Interaction research, just to name a few. You can find more information about me through the links below.
